mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.chanpinjingli_name as chanpinjingliName ,a.chanpinjingli_phone as chanpinjingliPhone ,a.chanpinjingli_id_number as chanpinjingliIdNumber ,a.chanpinjingli_photo as chanpinjingliPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM chanpinjingli a
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.chanpinjingli_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.chanpinjingliName},'%')
and a.chanpinjingli_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.chanpinjingliPhone},'%')
and a.chanpinjingli_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.chanpinjingliIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
